prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Letter from Woodrow Wilson to Horace Elisha Scudder, Accession # 6989, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This holding was purchased on October 29, 1962 and deposited on October 16, 1966.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In this letter to Horace Elisha Scudder, Woodrow Wilson submits an address to the Monthly for further perusal; admits difficulty in altering its style; reluctantly declines an invitation to visit.
